text: Blangy-sur-Ternoise is a commune in the Pas-de-Calais department in the Hauts- de-France region in northern France. ==Geography== Situated some 9 miles(15 km) northwest of Saint-Pol-sur-Ternoise, on the D94 road. ==Population== ==Personalities== *Saint Bertha of Artois, established a convent at Blangy and died here in 725. ==See also== *Communes of the Pas-de-Calais department ==References== * INSEE commune file Category:Communes of Pas-de-Calais
title: Blangy-sur-Ternoise
